channel.title: Home teleport [Delta]

item.title: Home teleport [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Rskit-kat, post:5, topic:465598”]so i’ve made this code.

case 73136: case 4143: case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest(" Home ", 2470); c.sendQuest("Desert", 2471); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2472); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;
How would I make it so when clicked on those it would tele?[/quote]
Find the actionbutton of each option, then make a variable to distinguish which teleports from which. I wouldn’t do it that way, but that’s how it’s done in Delta.

Read full topic

@Rskit-kat wrote:

well i was asking someone to explain cases. But, my pking teleport has 3 cases with 1 saying its teh edge tele one. So I was going to get rid of the other two and add my hometeleport one, but there is 3 cases for that aswell. I dont know whato know what cases to use and not to use to make it work correctly. I also wanted to know what the 3 cases did on my home teleport

item.title: Home teleport [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Rskit-kat Rskit-kat
item.description:
@Rskit-kat wrote:

I am trying to make it so, when i press the home button. It will ask for two places to go. The desert and edge. I am trying to base it off of my pking teleport which already does that, but I don’t know what teh cases mean in clickingmost.java
Heres my hometeleport code:

case 73100: case 4140: case 50235: c.triggerTele(3434,2903, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); c.frame61(0); break;

And here is my Pking teleport code:

case 73136: case 4143: case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest(" Which Pking zone? ", 2470); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2471); c.sendQuest("Varrock -Multi-", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank -1v1-", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469);

Could someone explain and help me make the code? Please

Read full topic
